person_say: I always disagree with my parents. How can I improve our communication?
animal_say: This sounds challenging! What specific situations lead to disagreements, and how do they make you feel?

person_say: Specific situations often involve my choices, like my career path or friendships. It makes me feel misunderstood and frustrated.
animal_say: It’s tough feeling misunderstood! Bruno, our mindfulness expert, can help you communicate better. Want to meet him?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bruno sounds great! I would love to learn how to communicate better.
animal_say: Fantastic! Let’s go see Bruno. He'll help you improve communication and understand each other better!
